entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Brantford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:17 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brantford Municipal Airport 08:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
Temperature: -1.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -4.7°C
Wind: WSW 23 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon then snow. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
